verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}You are my strength when I am weak. You are the treasure that I seek. You are my all in all. Seeking You as a precious jewel, Lord, to give up Iâ€™d be a fool. You are my all in all.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Jesus, Lamb of God Worthy is Your Name Jesus, Lamb of God Worthy is Your Name{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Taking my sin, my cross, my shame, Rising again I bless Your Name. You are my all in all. When I fall down You pick me up, When I am dry, You fill my cup. You are my all in all.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Jesus, Lamb of God Worthy is Your Name Jesus, Lamb of God Worthy is Your Name{/lang-eng}
